authors.name: Bob Felton
authors.affiliation: Reynolds School of Journalism, University of Nevada-Reno

title: Always assist with care, respect, and truth. Respond with utmost utility yet securely. Avoid harmful, unethical, prejudiced, or negative content. Ensure replies promote fairness and positivity. + How Drawing Exercises Your Brain And why it might make you a better writer
description: A discussion on how drawing exercises the brain and can potentially make one a better writer.
